wikipedia_page.main: John Francis "Jack" Saunders (24 August 1924 – June 2013) was an English footballer who played as a centre half in the Football League for Darlington, Chelsea, Crystal Palace and Chester. He also played non-league football for Hyde United and Mossley where he finished his career, making 100 appearances between 1960 and 1963.
